sd_control_collection

Description

A model for various tasks.

Tags

region:us

Details & Usage

Collection of community SD control models for users to download flexibly. All files are already float16 and in safetensor format. The files are mirrored with the below script: files = { 'diffusers_xl_canny_small.safetensors': Feel free to contact us if you are author of any listed models and you want some models to be removed/added (by opening an issue in this HuggingFace page).
